mapper.select: SELECT PEOP_ID, PEOP_NAME FROM PEOPLE P WHERE PEOP_NAME LIKE #{name}
SELECT M.MOVI_ID, M.MOVI_NAME FROM MOVIE M LEFT OUTER JOIN CAST C on M.MOVI_ID = C.MOVI_ID WHERE C.PEOP_ID = #{peop_id}

SELECT B.PEOP_ID, B.PEOP_NAME FROM ( SELECT /*+index_desc(IDX_PEOPLE_PK)*/ ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.PEOP_ID, A.PEOP_NAME FROM ( SELECT PEOP_ID, PEOP_NAME FROM PEOPLE order by PEOP_ID ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page}*#{amount}) B WHERE B.RNUM > (#{page}-1)*#{amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAST SET PEOP_NAME = #{peop_name} WHERE PEOP_ID = #{peop_id}
